cause.description:
This is to prepare all people for the inevitable. Knowledge about all scenarios and accidents, and how to survive within them, to be passed amongst all the people. This is a serious cause, and if you do not believe in it... Then you will end up being one more mindless bastard with thier head being blown after Z-day.
1. Zombies are coming
2. Theres no time
3. Hurry up
cause.mission: Help all Zombie noobs, or Wanna Bee's Become Safe
cause.name: Zombie Awareness
